text: <!here> hey everyone! Been a lurker in this chat for about a month or two but want to start posting more. I'm the new content lead at Knotch, a content intelligence company that helps enterprise businesses measure their owned and paid content. Part of my role is to gather expert insights from marketing leaders on topics related to content marketing to feature in our blog content. I was wondering if marketers here would like to be added to my source list and contacted from time to time for quotes. Happy to link back to your site or promote your brand in some way. If you're up for it, please add your contact info to this sheet: <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1NHs-s-84TScDkdBtG5V-Piv2Dnz0oFLtRTTWLMQRxjo/edit#gid=0>
